text:
How to recycle any viral post.

1. Find the viral posts with this AI:

✦ Go to easygen.io to find viral posts.
✦ Copy the image of a high outlier index one.
✦ Find another quote (from another viral post).

2. Go to another AI to mix them.

✦ Go to gemini.google.com to edit photos.
✦ Paste the image you wanted to edit.
✦ Give it the new quote & generate.

3. Go back to EasyGen to finish the post.

✦ Click "Repurpose" (down right) on the viral post.
✦ Add a new Topic = it's like a prompt on ChatGPT.
✦ Generate until you (absolutely) love it.

4. Time to post.

✦ Upload the new image with the new quote.
✦ Copy & paste the new caption from EasyGen.
✦ Go viral, once again.
